na atsempɔn wɔnntsetse do
wɔsae

column2: "Wɔsaan mu yiyii enyame fofor; Nna dɔm baa kuropon ekyir: Ana wohun akokyɛm anaa nkambaa Wɔ Israel mpeduanan no mu a?"
"M’akoma da Israel ambradofo ho. Ɔman no mu hɔn a wɔpraa hɔn yamu bae no a: Hom nhyira EWURADZE."
"Hom a hom tsetse nsoasopɔnkɔ efufuw do
column3: Hom a hom tsetse nkuntu pa do
column4: Na hom a hom nenam ɔkwan do
Hɔ ara na wɔnka EWURADZE ne tsenenee esiado
column5: No nhwɛdo tsenenee ndwuma wɔ Israel mu no a. Nna EWURADZE ne man sianee kɔr nkuropon mu."

column4: Debora; Nyan

column2: "Nna etumfo nkaa no na ɔman no sianee; EWURADZE sianee ketsiaa akatakyi maa me."
"Efraim mu na hɔn a hɔn ndwow wɔ Amalek mu fii sianee; W’ekyir
column4: wɔ wo nkorɔfo mu; Makir mu na ambradofo fi sianee
column5: Na Zebulun mu na hɔn a wokitsa kyerɛwfo n’abaa."

column2: "Na Isakar asafohemfo ka Debora ho; Dɛ mbrɛ Isakar tse
column3: dɛmara so na Barak tse; Wɔbɔɔ kyirididi wɔ n’anan ho koguu ɔbɔn no mu. Reuben nsuka no ho Hɔ na akoma mu pɔwbɔ akɛse wɔ."
Ritsie nguankuw no mu mbɛnhɛn? Reuben nsuka no do Hɔ na akoma mu nhwehwɛɛ akɛse wɔ."

column2: "Gilead tsenaa Jordan egya. Na Dan dze
column3: ebɛnadze ntsi na ɔkaa ahɛn mu? Aser tsenaa epo ahɛngyinaa komm
column4: Na no dɔndɔn no ho na ɔtsenae."

column2: "Zebulun yɛ ɔman a wɔdze hɔn nkwa sɔɔ owu hwɛe
column3: Na Naftali so wɔ haban mu mbeambea sorɔnsorɔm."

column2: "Ahemfo bae bedzii ako; Nna Keenan ahemfo bɔkoe
column4: Megiddo nsuwansuwa ho: Wɔammfa sika mfaso biara."

column3: Nworaba fifii hɔn akwan do nye Sisera koe."
